donate.title: Support the project
donate.subtitle: Mindra is built to support and motivate people. Any contribution helps us add new features and languages.
donate.goal.title: Why we need funds
donate.goal.text: Funds go to building the mobile app, server costs and the team’s work. The goal is $150,000. The more we raise, the faster we’ll launch and add new capabilities.
donate.goal.points.1: FaceTime-style video calls with Mindra — choose an appearance and talk face-to-face.
donate.goal.points.2: All Telegram-bot features in one place: dialog, goals, habits, reports.
donate.goal.points.3: 11 languages, a friendly UI and a basis for an offline mode in the future.
donate.plans.title: Plans
donate.plans.subtitle: Prices in USD. Founder discounts apply automatically.
donate.plans.freeNote: Free plan without FaceTime with the bot.
donate.plans.soon: Subscriptions are coming soon. For now, you can support the project with a donation ❤️
